moves.1. c4 c6: A little bit strange. 1. ... c5 is better.
moves.3... Nf6 4. Nc3 Na6: Not good. A Knight on the column a or h is not at the good place. Bf5 is better.
moves.5. Bg5 Bg4 6. e3 e6 7. Be2 Be7 8. O-O O-: Here the white camp is in a good position.
moves.9. h3 Bxh3: Open the white castle but loose the bishop. Bxf3 is better here.
moves.10. gxh3 Nc7: Too late! The Knight may be there at the 5th move.
moves.11. Bxf6 Bxf6 12. e4: Whites have a big center and blacks couldn't really attack.
moves.17. Rad1 Nf4 18. Kh2 Qd6: It is dangerous for the whites but an error is coming.
moves.19. Nb5: attack the queen and the pawn. But taud don't see it!
